He wants to use this loan to purchase construction tools, because it is important to him and without these tools he won't be able to continue working in construction in his community.

One of Daniel's greatest dreams is to see his son grow and to give him an education so that he can become a professional and start a construction business in service to his community and its future development.

loans.use: to purchase construction tools

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to pay for his mother's medical treatment.

loans.name: Mercedes Marily

texts.es:
Mercedes tiene 22 años de edad, de estado civil conviviente, tiene una hija, vive en el caserio de Zapotal, una pequeña comunidad que se dedica a la agricultura, y ganadería, ubicada a 10 minutos del distrito de Morropon, provincia del mismo nombre y departamento de Piura, costa norte del Perú.

Ella se dedica a la crianza y comercialización de animales, como patos, gallos, gallinas, chivos y cerdos, desde hace 1 año, su negocio se encuentra ubicado en la parte posterior de su domicilio,además su conviviente presta servicios de Mototaxi, ella ha solicitado un préstamo a Edpyme Alternativa de 500 nuevos soles para la compra de pavos y maíz para sus animales y de esta manera generar mayores ingresos para su familia.
texts.en:
Mercedes is 22 years old, and she lives with her partner and her daughter. She lives in the village of Zapotal, a small agriculture and ranching community located 10 minutes from the Morropon district, in the province of the same name, and in the department of Piura on the northern coast of Peru. 

Mercedes has been raising and selling animals such as ducks, chickens, hens, goats, and pigs for one year. Her business is located behind her home, and her partner provides taxi services. Mercedes has requested a loan of 500 soles from Edpyme Alternativa to purchase turkeys and corn for her animals, so that she can generate more income for her family.

loans.use: buy turkeys and corn to grow her business.

loans.name: Hassan

texts.en:
Greetings from Sierra Leone! This is 49-year-old Hassan from OIC Roplo in the northern area of Sierra Leone. He is married with five children and started this business to take care of his family's welfare. 

Hassan runs a general stock business selling soft drinks, pure water, rice and cooking oil. He has been running this business since 1999, and works at the business 12 hours per day, 6 days per week. Hassan says that his main business challenges are that transportation is a problem and his product is scarce. 

Hassan has requested a loan in order to buy more soft drinks, pure water, rice, and cooking oil for resale. The extra income from this loan will allow him to become a successful business man and improve his standard of living. In the future, he plans to expand his business more than ever. He thanks you for your support!

loans.use: to buy more soft drinks, pure water, rice and cooking oil for resale.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: purchase eyewear and watches.

loans.name: Nora Lisbeth

texts.es:
Nora Aguirre tiene 23 años de edad, vive en casa propia con su conviviente e hijo en el distrito de Buenos aires, su población es amable, se dedican a la agricultura, comercio y ganadería, ubicada en la Provincia de Morropon que pertenece a la Región Piura, costa norte del Perú.

Ella se dedica a la venta de comidas tipicas de la zona en especial los dias; sabados, domingos y lunes en su domicilio, cuenta con clientela fija. Ella es alegre, amable y trabajadora que se esfuerza para tener una mejor calidad de vida. y ha solicitado un préstamo a Edpyme Alternativa de 1 000 nuevos soles para mejorar su local de atencion al publico, de esta manera tendra un lugar más acojedor y de esta manera obtendra mas clientes y mayores ingresos para su familia.
texts.en:
Nora Aguirre is 23 years old. She lives in her own home with her partner and son in the Buenos Aires district. People there are friendly and work in agriculture, commerce, and ranching. It is located in the Morropon province in the Piura region on Peru's northern coast.

She makes a living by selling prepared food from her home on Saturdays, Sundays, and Mondays. She has a customer base.

She is happy, friendly, and hardworking, and works hard to have a better quality of life. She has requested a loan from Edpyme Alternativa for 1,000 nuevos soles. She will use the loan to improve her home where she serves her customers so that she will have a more accommodating place. This way, she will be able to attract more customers and earn more income for her family.

loans.use: to improve her home so that it will have a better appearance for her customers.

loans.name: Segundo Claudio

texts.es:
Segundo tiene 52 años de edad, vive junto a su esposa y su menor hijo en el distrito de Morropon, una comunidad que se dedica a la agricultura, comercio y ganadería, ubicada en la Provincia de Piura perteneciente al departamento de Piura,costa norte del Perú.

Él se dedica a la venta de pescado con una antigüedad de 15 años, su negocio se encuentra ubicado en su domicilio, él ha solicitado un préstamo a Edpyme alternativa de s/ 1000,00 para invertir en su negocio; comprando más producto ya que el mercado presente buenas perspectivas, ello le permitirá generar mas ingresos para el y su familia .
texts.en:
Segundo is 52 years old. He lives with his wife and young son in the Morropon district, a community dedicated to agriculture, trade, and livestock, which is located in the Piura province in the department of Piura on the northern coast of Peru.

Segundo has been selling fish for 15 years, and his business is located inside his home. He has requested a loan of 1,000 soles from Edpyme Alternativa to invest in his business; buying more product will present good prospects, which will allow Segundo to generate more income for himself and his family.

loans.use: buy fish in bulk.

loans.name: Grupo Pacut 2 Group

texts.es:
Mujeres emprendedoras se han convertido en el motor de nuestro país que día a día con su esfuerzo se dedican a los que mejor saben hacer en el campo es el caso de doña María de 34 años de edad residente en Sololá con un hijo que es estudiantes de la comunidad donde ella tiene que hacer el esfuerzo para poder sacar a la familia hacia adelante, (María es la que tiene una blusa de color negro la que esta de primero en la derecha).
	
La actividad que ella dignamente realiza es la producción de banano en su aldea, dicha actividad lo aprendió de sus padres desde hace 15 años que lo han venido haciendo  para luego venderlas en el mayoreo de su comunidad, es la única actividad que ella realiza para poder tener un ingreso económico y obtener ganancias y mejorar la condición de vida en la que ella y su familia.

El uso respectivo que ella le dará al crédito que ella está realizando es para la compra de insecticidas para el mantenimiento de bananos con que ella cuenta en su terreno para que mejore la producción de las mismas.

Ella es un ejemplo de las mujeres emprendedoras y es por ello que se unieron a ella un grupo de mujeres para emprender junto a ella el negocio para un desarrollo mejor de su comunidad.

Una de las visiones de ella es construir dos casas de block para que su familia tenga condiciones de vida perfectas en el futuro.
texts.en:
Enterprising women have become the engine that keeps the country going day after day. Those who know the best are the women who work in the fields. Such is the case with Doña María. She is 34 years old and resides in Sololá with her son who is a student in the community. María strives to help her family get ahead. In the photo, she is the person standing on the right wearing a black blouse.

María makes a decent living by producing bananas in her neighborhood. She learned this trade from her parents when she was 15 years old and has been doing this ever since. María sells her products wholesale in her community. It is the only business she has that allows her to generate a profitable income. As a result, she is able to improve the living conditions for herself and her family.

Her respective loan will be used to buy insecticides for maintaining the banana crops on her land. This will help to improve production. María is an example of an enterprising woman. For this reason, she joined a group of women so that they could work together to improve the development in their community.

One of her goals is to build two block houses for her family so that they will have perfect living conditions in the future.

loans.use: to buy insecticides for her banana crops.

loans.name: Iracely Isabel

texts.es:
La señora Iracely Isabel, es madre soltera de 2 hijos de los cuales ambos están bajo su cargo y son de edad escolar, labora como estilista en un salón de belleza de la ciudad de León, se dedica a esta labor desde hace 14 años, inicia sus labores de 08:30 am y finalizándolas a las 04:00 pm de lunes a sábado en este mismo horario, el realiza esta labor para la manutención de su hogar y de sus pequeños hijos.

Doña Iracely, solicito a Ceprodel un crédito el que utilizo para la compra de cosméticos y tratamientos para el cabello; así lograr brindar un mejor servicio a su clientela con productos de mejor calidad o que le permitirá incrementar su capital de trabajo al igual que su nivel de vida.

Nota: la persona que aparece en fotografía con la señora Iracely es cliente la cual se toma como ejemplo de la forma como ejerce su labor diaria.
texts.en:
Iracely Isabel is the single mother of two children, both of whom are of school age and in her care.

She works as a stylist in a beauty salon in the city of León.  She starts work at 8:30 a.m. and finishes at 4 p.m. from Monday through Saturday, and has worked in this job for 14 years.  She does this work to support her household and her small children.

Iracely asked CEPRODEL for a loan that she used to buy cosmetics and hair treatments.  That way she'll manage to give better customer service with higher-quality products or increase her working capital as well as her standard of living.

The woman that appears in the photo with Iracely Isabel is one of her clients.

loans.use: to buy cosmetics and hair treatments

loans.name: Alicia Del Carmen

texts.es: Doña Alicia mujer trabajadora, con el crédito anterior realizo un baño con todas las condiciones sanitarias, permitiendo brindar a su familia mejor higiene, su labor siempre es el de ejecutiva de ventas en una empresa privada y su pareja de vida trabaja como conductor, sus hijos son mayores de edad pero aun habitan con ella, doña Alicia quien lucha por ver bonita su casa solicita el crédito, en esta ocasión para comprar tres puertas con sus accesorios y laminas de zinc para tapar el techo del baño que ha dejado pendiente, así poco a poco va mejorando su humilde vivienda.
texts.en:
Alicia is a hardworking woman. With her previous loan, she built a bathroom with sanitary conditions, which allowed her family to improve their hygiene. She is still working as a sales woman in a private business. Her husband works as a driver. Their children are adults but still live with them.

Alicia works hard so that her home will look nice. She requests this loan to purchase three doors and their accessories and zinc laminate to cover the bathroom roof that is still incomplete. This way, she is improving her humble home little by little.

loans.use: to purchase three doors and zinc laminate.

loans.name: Porfirio

texts.es:
El socio continua dedicándose a la venta de comestibles, él socio lleva años dedicándose a este negocio el cual le va bien gracias al empeño  que le pone cada día a su negocio, él socio a la vez continua dedicándose a trabajar en construcción civil, él socio desea poder seguir trabajando para de esta forma seguir apoyando  a su familia.
El socio solicita el crédito para comprar gaseosas, leche entre otros.

El socio está feliz con el crédito y se compromete a pagar las cuotas.
texts.en:
The borrower continues to earn a living selling groceries. He has been working in this business for many years, and it is going well for him thanks to the effort he puts into his business every day. At the same time, the borrower continues working in civil construction. He desires to be able to keep working, so in this way he can continue supporting his family. 

The borrower is requesting a loan to buy soda, milk, and other items. He is happy to have a loan, and is committed to making the payments.

loans.use: to buy soda, milk, and other items.

loans.name: Norbita Eudalita

texts.es:
Norbita es una señora de 44 años, vive junto a su esposo y sus tres hijos en la ciudad de Santo Domingo, ciudad conocida en el Ecuador por ser el puerto terrestre que une a la sierra y la costa, pueblo rico en comercio y producción.
Norbita es una señora muy trabajadora, junto a su esposo se dedican a la venta de camarón, los fines de semana recorren en el sector y muchas veces su esposo viaja hasta Manabí a entregar a clientela fija, ya llevan 4 años con este negocio, el mismo que les ha ayudado a salir adelante y darles las educación a sus hijos que ellos en su juventud por falta de recursos no pudieron obtener.
Su esposo además compra y faena chanchos para vender su carne, tiene mucha clientela que le pide para fiestas y eventos.
Norbita y Vicente han atravesados problemas pero juntos han podido sobrellevarlos, su esposo hace años atrás estuvo al borde de la muerte por un accidente pero su apoyo y cuidado de los médicos hicieron posible que siga con vida, fue una época muy dura ya que ella sola tuvo que trabajar para sustentar a su familia. Ahora se sienten muy agradecidos por la oportunidad de vida que Dios le dio. 
Norbita y Vicente con el pequeño crédito recibido de Fundación Alternativa van a comprar camarón ya que desean capitalizarse porque en un futuro con sus ingresos tienen planificado construir su propia casa.
Agradecen a Fundación Alternativa y a Kiva por hacer posible su crecimiento.
texts.en:
Norbita is a 44-year-old woman who lives together with her husband and their three children in the city of Santo Domingo, a city known in Ecuador for being the land port that unites the mountains and the coast. It is a town that is rich in business and production. 

Norbita is a very hardworking woman, and together with her husband they work selling shrimp. On the weekends they go all over the area and many times her husband travels to Manabí to deliver to the regular customers. They already have had this business for four years, the same one that has helped them to get ahead and give their children the education that they could not obtain in their childhoods for lack of resources. 

Her husband also buys and slaughters pigs to sell the meat. He has many customers who request him for parties and events. 

Norbita and Vicente have gone through problems but together they have been able to endure them. Years ago her husband was on the brink of death due to an accident but her support and care of the doctors made it possible for him to continue to live. It was a very hard time since she alone had to work to sustain the family. Now they feel very grateful for the opportunity of life that God gave him. 

With the small credit received from Fundación Alternativa, Norbita and Vicente are going to buy shrimp, since they wish to capitalize on it because in the future with their income they have planned to build their own house. 

They thank Fundación Alternativa and Kiva for making their growth possible.

loans.use: to buy shrimp to increase her inventory

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchases more used clothing to sell.

loans.name: Nueva Generacion De Putucusi Group

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal NUEVA GENERACION DE PUTUCUSI, el banco está ubicado en el distrito de Quellouno, provincia de La Convención.
La socia Gavina tiene 49 años de edad tiene 04 hijos y es conviviente, la socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de tienda de abarrotes, la socia lleva buen tiempo con su negocio el cual le va bien gracias al empeño que le pone cada día a su negocio, la socia vende diferentes tipos de productos como arroz, azucar, leche entre otros, la socia  a la vez se dedica a la agricultura, la socia desea poder seguir trabajando para de esta forma seguir apoyando a su familia.
La socia solicita el crédito para la compra de arroz, azúcar entre otros.
La socia se siente agradecida por el crédito otorgado y se compromete a cumplir con sus cuotas establecidas.
texts.en:
The member belongs to the communal bank of NUEVA GENERACION DE PUTUCUSI.  The bank is located in the district of Quellouno, in the province of La Convención.  

Gavina, the member, is 49 years old and has four children.  

Gavina alternates her daily activities with the business of the grocery store.  She has had her business for quite some time which has gone well thanks to the commitment she gives each day to it.  She sells different types of products such as rice, sugar, and milk, among other things.  She also works in agriculture at the same time.  Gavina hopes to be able to continue working so that she can continue to support her family.

The member is requesting a loan for the purchase of rice and sugar, among other things.  She is grateful for the loan offered and promises to comply with her established payment quotes.

loans.use: to purchase rice and sugar, among other things.

loans.name: Aldair Enmanuel

texts.es: Aldair es un joven apasionado con los negocios, tiene 20 años de edad y está soltero, el principal motor en sus estudios han sido sus padres quienes lo han apoyado en todo. Está cursando el primer año de la carrera de Administracion de Empresas nos cuenta que la escogió porque le ha permitido conocer el amplio y atractivo mundo de los negocios y eso le gusta mucho. Solicita el crédito para el pago de las mensualidades de la universidad, ya que le ayudara a seguir estudiando. Dentro de sus planes futuros están terminar su carrera y obtener su título de licenciado y luego obtener su Master. Su meta próxima es terminar el año lectivo con buenas calificaciones y seguir destacándose en la música y el deporte.
texts.en: Aldair is a young man, who is passionate about business. He is 20 years old and single. The inspiration behind his studies are his parents who have always supported him. He is in his first year of Business Administration and he says he chose it because it allows him to learn about the broad and attractive business world which he likes a lot. He is requesting a loan to pay the monthly college payments so that he can keep on studying. His future plans are to finish his career and get a Bachelor degree and later get his Masters. His next goal is to finish the current year with good grades and to continue to excel in music and sports.

loans.use: to pay for monthly college tuition payments.

loans.name: Ruth Alexandra

texts.es:
El Grupo De Crédito Cdla. Los Almendros se reúne cada 15 días en el barrio Los Almendros en la ciudad de Manta,  ciudad conocida por sus hermosas playas que son muy visitadas en toda época del año y por ser una ciudad con una belleza sin igual con muchos atractivos turísticos.
En este lugar vive la señora Ruth, tiene 49 años de edad, está separada pero  de esa relación tiene tres hijos mayores de edad, uno de ellos aun vive en su casa.
Doña Ruth adecuo un local en su casa en la cual surtió una pequeña tienda de víveres, ella además de víveres  también vende productos de Belcorp y Yanbal  (productos de belleza, cosméticos, perfumería y accesorios para damas).  Su tienda la tiene muy bien surtida y cada día aumenta su clientela ya que con los créditos compra mayor variedad de productos, tiene casi dos años con este negocio el cual le sirve para salir adelante.
Este crédito lo va a emplear en surtir mas su tienda, va a comprar víveres y cosméticos. Está en el Grupo De Crédito 9 años y le gusta por la ayuda que siempre le dan en el grupo. Sus metas son seguir adelante mejorando su vida cada vez más.
texts.en:
The Ciudadela Los Almendros [Almond Tree Citadel] Credit Group meets twice a month in the Los Almendros section of the city of Manta. This area is known for its unmatched beauty, many tourist attractions, and the spectacular coastline that draws crowds of beach-lovers throughout the year. 

Manta is also the home of Señora Ruth She is 49 years old, separated from her husband, and the mother of three adult children, one of whom still lives in her home. 

Doña Ruth set up a small grocery shop in her home in order to establish a source of income. She sells basic groceries, but also offers beauty products, cosmetics, perfumes, and women's accessories from Belcorp and Yanbal. Doña Ruth's store is well-stocked, but is attracting new customers every day, so Doña Ruth has used the loans that she's received through the credit group to purchase a greater variety of products. Doña Ruth has run her business for nearly two years, and it has improved her financial situation. 

Doña Ruth will use the funds from this loan to purchase additional inventory for her store, grocery items and cosmetics. She has been a member of the credit group for nine years, and is pleased with the support she's received from the group. She hopes to continue improving her business and her life.

loans.use: to purchase grocery items and cosmetics.

loans.name: Rocio Miriam

texts.en:
Rocio describes herself as a fun-loving, kind, simple person. She likes to listen to music, read and spend time with her grandson. 

She owns a grocery store that she opened in her house more than 10 years ago. Rocio works from Monday to Friday from 7:00 a.m. to 11:00 p.m. She is asking for a loan to buy more products for her store. She says that by offering more products, she can increase her sales and profits. 

In the future, she would like to buy a fridge for milk and other dairy products. Rocio says that her biggest achievement is opening her store and maintaining it for such a long time. Her goal is to grow her business.

loans.use: to buy products for her grocery store.

loans.name: Ana María

texts.es:
Ana tiene 55 años de edad, está soltera y tiene tres hijos los cuales ella siempre se esforzó para sacarlos adelante.  


Ella se dedica al comercio de productos básicos, es una actividad que la ha realizado por más de 3 años y se ha convertido en su principal fuente de ingresos, por otra parte sus hijos se dedican a la agricultura, a la siembra de granos básicos y compra y venta, de modo que le ayudan a su madre para compensar el esfuerzo que ha hecho por ellos.

Ella necesita el crédito para comprar más productos básicos para la venta, de esta forma surtirá su negocio y dará un mejor servicio a sus clientes, y por ende mejorarán los ingresos familiares de Ana.

Las planes que ella tiene para un futuro son ampliar y mejorar su negocio, apoyar en la educación de sus hijos, para que sean unos profesionales de éxito.
texts.en: Ana is 55 years old. She is single and has three children, whom she raised with effort. She works selling basic products, an activity she has done for more than 3 years. This has become her main source of income. On the other hand her children work in agriculture, they grow basic grains and buy and sell; in this way they help their mother to reward her for what she has done for them. She needs the loan to buy more basic products to sell. This way she will stock up her business and give better service to her customers, and therefore, Ana's household income will improve. Her plans for the future are to increase and improve her business, support her children's education so that they become successful professionals.

loans.use: to buy more basic products to sell, and in this way stock up her business and give better service to her customers, and therefore improve her household income.

loans.name: Magdalena

texts.es:
De 55 años de edad casada originaria del departamento de Suchitepéquez que tiene tres hijos el primero casado y tiene ya su familia, el segundo y tercero estudian en la comunidad donde viven ellos es impresionante el esfuerzo que ella hace a pesar de su edad ella es una mujer emprendedora y que dice que nunca es demasiado tarde para empezar a desarrollar y tener una visión en el futuro.

La actividad que ella dignamente a desempeñado durante 40 años es la compraventa de abarrotería en la comunidad ya que es por medio de ella puede obtener un ingreso económico para su familia y una ganancia para mejora su condición de vida.

El uso respectivo que doña Magdalena le dará al préstamo que ella solicita es para compra de terreno que le están ofreciendo en su comunidad para dejar un mejor futuro para sus hijos y que tengan ellos con que desarrollarse en un futuro.

Los sueños de ella es que las condiciones de su familia sean las adecuadas para un futuro y es por eso que quiere compra dos molinos de nixtamal instalarlas en su comunidad.
texts.en:
Magdalena is 55 years old, married, and a native of the departmament of Suchitepéquez. She has 3 children, the oldest of which is married and already has a family; the second and third go to school in their community. The effort that she puts forth despite her age is impressive; she is an enterprising woman who says that it is never too late to begin to grow and have a vision for the future.

For 40 years, she has worked with dignity as a middleman selling groceries in her community. Through this work, she is able to make a living to support her family and improve their quality of life.

Magdalena will use this loan to purchase a plot of land that is for sale in her community, in order to give her children a better future and give them the resources to improve their own future.

Her dreams are that her family's situation will be secure into the future, and for this reason, she wants to purchase 2 corn mills located in her community.

loans.use: to purchase land

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy a sewing machine, embroidery machine and a table.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to buy a generator and a sewing machine.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to pay for her grandson’s education.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to pay for his son’s education.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to buy a generator and iron.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to renovate her salon into a beauty center.

loans.name: Luis Manuel

texts.es:
Luis es un joven comprometido con sacar adelante a su familia, es soltero, tiene 23 años y vive en Independencia junto a su familia. Es una persona muy emprendedora. Gracias el esfuerzo de sus padres pudo estudiar la carrera universitaria de Ingeniería de Sistemas y a la fecha ya tiene concluida la carrera. También trabaja en una prestigiosa empresa y le va muy bien porque es muy responsable, honesto y siempre se identifica con la ética con la que trabaja gracias a que sus padres le inculcaron muchos valores desde niño.
Luis está muy agradecido con los prestamistas Kiva porque con el apoyo que le han brindado podrá iniciar los trámites para obtener su Bachiller, con esto podrá conseguir un trabajo mejor remunerado y ayudará a mejorar la calidad de vida de su familia. De esta manera seguirá luchando para continuar estudiando y convertirse en un profesional exitoso.
texts.en:
Luis is a young man who is committed to moving his family forward. He is single, is 23 years old, and lives in Independencia with his family. He is a very entrepreneurial person. Thanks to his parents' efforts, he was able to study Systems Engineering at university and he has completed his classes. He also works at a prestigious business. It is going well because he is very responsible, honest, and always uses the ethics that his parents instilled at a young age.

Luis is very grateful to Kiva lenders because, with their support, he will be able to begin the procedure to obtain his degree. Then, he will be able to get a higher paying job, which will improve his family's quality of life. He will be able to continue working to continue his studies and become a successful professional.

loans.use: to pay school fees.

loans.name: Ines

texts.es:
Ines tiene 33 años de edad, estado civil conviviente, reside en el AA HH Santa Julia de Morropon, Piura, Perú desde hace más de 20 años siendo natural de la zona. La vida en la comunidad es tranquila ya que se dedican al comercio y crianza de ganado menor.

La actividad a la que se dedica la señora es al comercio de granos y crianza y venta de aves de corral, actividad que realiza desde hace 4 años. Ella cuenta con experiencia en el negocio y con muy buenas referencias crediticias. Ella a solicitado un préstamo a Edpyme alternativa de s/ 2000,00 para construir dos cuartos en su casa y asi poder mejorar su calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Ines is 33 years old, and lives with her partner in Santa Julia de Morropon, Piura, Perú. She is a native of the area and has lived there for more than 20 years. It is a tranquil community, where residents work in commerce and the raising of small livestock.

For 4 years, she has sold grain and raised and sold poultry for a living, which she has done for the past 4 years. She relies on her experience in the business and good references.

She is requesting a 2,000 PEN loan from Edpyme Alternativa to construct two rooms in her house to improve her quality of life.

loans.use: to construct two rooms in her house

loans.name: Cesar Alberto

texts.es:
Cesar es un joven soltero, dedicado a su familia, tiene 25 años de edad y vive en Acari junto a sus padres.
Desde muy joven tuvo que trabajar para poder apoyar a su familia en los gastos del hogar. Es una persona muy responsable con un propósito en la vida: "Sacar adelante a sus padres". Sus padres, si bien es cierto no pudieron darle cosas materiales, pero desde niño lo inculcaron con valores que hoy lo diferencian de muchas personas. Esta persona honesta, tiene muchos años de experiencia en la agricultura, labora con unos terrenos que tiene sembrando diversos productos y le va muy bien porque siempre se esfuerza en todo lo que hace y le gusta su trabajo.
Cesar piensa utilizar el préstamo piensa comprar plaguicidas y fertilizantes para los cultivos, así como realizar un control fitosanitario de las plantas para que de esta manera obtenga productos de mayor calidad. Cesar quiere dar las gracias a los prestamistas Kiva por todo el apoyo que le han brindado y que gracias a ellos él podrá mejorar la calidad de vida de su familia.
texts.en:
Cesar is a young man is dedicated to his family. He is 25 years old and lives in Acari with his parents. He had to work from a young age in order to help his family with household expenses. He is a very responsible person with one goal in life: "to move his parents forward". It is true that his parents were not able to provide him with material goods, but they instilled values in him that differentiate him from many people. He is an honest person with many years of experience in agriculture. He grows various products on his land and it is going well because he puts forth great effort in all that he does and he enjoys his job.

Cesar will use the loan to purchase pesticide and fertilizers for his crops so that he can control pests on his crops. This way, he will be able to produce higher quality products. Cesar wants to thank Kiva lenders for all of the support that they have provided. Thanks to them, he will be able to provide a better quality of life to his family.

loans.use: to purchase supplies (pesticide and fertilizers) to maintain his crops.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to pay for his son's school expenses.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to pay for her son's education.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to pay for his children's education.

loans.name: Felisa

texts.en:
Felisa is 61 years old and married with two children.  With her children in school, Felisa works very hard to provide for them.

She runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 17,000 loan through NWTF to buy items to sell such as shampoo and groceries.

Felisa has been in this business for 4 years.

In the future Felisa would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy items to sell such as shampoo and groceries

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to pay for his son's school expenses.

loans.name: Lydia

texts.en:
Lydia is 68 years old and widowed with eight children. She works very hard to provide for them.

She runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 29,500 loan through NWTF to purchase additional items to sell such as canned goods, egg, milk and sugar.

Lydia has been in this business for 6 years.

In the future Lydia would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase additional items to sell such as canned goods, egg, milk and sugar

loans.name: Nengah

texts.en:
Nengah is an artisan who specializes in hand-carved wood art. He would like to invest in a bulk purchase of raw wood.

Nengah has been selling through NOVICA since 2004. This is his story:

"From an early age I loved natural things: plants, animals, birds or sea life. When I was still quite young I knew I had an ability to translate nature into artful things of beauty. Although I have no formal art training and work purely from my own inspiration and intuition, I know what looks good and what doesn't look right in a carving. I particularly want to create wildlife and other animal themes in an exact, realistic and original way.

"I need some capital to add to my stock and start preparing for the busy holiday season. My detailed, painted sculptures need a long time for production and painting. I will use the microcredit to buy wood and paints. I am grateful to all of you who support me with the microcredit and make this possible."

Use the link below to view Nengah's hand-carved wood art on the NOVICA site:
http://www.novica.com/kiva/4660

loans.use: to invest in a bulk purchase of raw wood for his carvings

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy a laptop and pay for his son's tuition fees, buy books and pay for his transportation expenses.

loans.name: Nadi

texts.en:
Nadi is very happy because his business is successful. He got a loan from MUK, and can manage his business well and increase the number of his customers. He paid his customers on time and his customers are very satisfied. Now he could buy a gold necklace for his wife, pay the loan and save for venture capital. All of his family feels the benefits and they are very happy. 
Because of his service satisfying his customers, Nadi is trusted by his customers. To cover all the junk, he applied for a loan from MUK. He is very grateful to MUK, because of the financial support that he received, and his business can thrive and succeed.
With new loan of 5,000,000 IDR, Nadi will buy more junk from his customers. With this business, Nadi is hoping to get an increase in results. He could meet the needs of his family and he has a plan to buy a better motorcyle to support his efforts. To support the plan, all of the profits will be saved.

loans.use: To purchase more junk

loans.name: Maria Temporina

texts.es:
Maria tiene 38 años de edad, vive con su esposo y dos hijas, en casa familiar, en el caserio de Carrasquillo , goza con buenas referencias personales y laborales de parte de sus vecinos, su población se dedica a la agricultura, comercio y ganadería, ubicada en el distrito de Buenos Aires, Provincia de Morropon, pertenenciente al departamento de Piura, costa norte del Perú.

La actividad que realiza María es la crianza y venta de productos tales como; cerveza , gaseosas, adicionalmente se dedica a la crianza y venta de animales menores como patos, gallinas y pollos, desde hace 5 años en su propio domicilio, ha solicitado un préstamo a Edpyme Alternativa de 1000 nuevos soles para la compra un nuevo electrodoméstico (Refrigerador) que le servirá para conservar una mayor cantidad de gaseosas y cervezas ello le permitirá ofrecer un producto con mejor calidad, lo que le generara mejores ingresos y mejorará su calidad de vida.
texts.en:
María is 38 years old and lives with her husband and two daughters in their family home, in the small village of Carrasquillo. She has good personal and professional references from her neighbors. Members of her community work in agriculture, commerce, and stockbreeding. It is located in the district of Buenos Aires, Morropon province, belonging to the department of Piura, on the northern coast of Perú.

María sells products such as beer and soft drinks, and also raises and sells small animals such as ducks, hens, and chicks. She has worked out of her own home in this way for the past 5 years.

She has requested a loan of 1000 PEN from Edpyme Alternativa to purchase a new appliance (a refrigerator), which will let her store more soft drinks and beer. She will be able to offer a higher quality product, generating more income and improving her quality of life.

loans.use: to purchase a new refrigerator, so she can serve more clients

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to purchase a sewing machine to increase her business

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to buy an iron and sewing machine.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to buy iron and  sewing machine.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to pay for the medical treatment of a family member

loans.name: Vevencia

texts.en:
As a married parent of six children, three of whom are in school, Vevencia works hard to support her family.

She has a dried fish business in the Philippines, and earns additional income from motorcycle transport. Vevencia is borrowing PHP 10,000 through NWTF to purchase more fish to sell in her dried fish business.

Vevencia has been sustaining her business activities through her past 21 loans from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream of saving enough money so she cab afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to purchase more fish to sell

loans.name: Analyn

texts.en:
Analyn works hard to support her family. Analyn has a peanut butter selling business in the Philippines.

She requested a PHP 17,000 loan through NWTF to purchase ingredients for her business.

Analyn has been in this business for 4 years now.

In the future, Analyn would like to build and expand her business to secure the financial stability of her family.

loans.use: to purchase ingredients for her business

loans.name: Mamerto

texts.en:
Mamerto is 45 years old and lives in Canibungan Daku, Clarin, Philippines. He is married with 3 children. 
To earn a living, Mamerto has a business selling "lechon manok" (roasted chicken). He earns about PHP 5000 each month doing this type of work. Mamerto has requested a loan to provide capital for his "lechon manok" business. He wants to buy raw ingredients to increase inventories of said business.
Mamerto has been a member of PMPC for 9 years. In the future, Mamerto would like to save more and expand his business.

loans.use: to provide capital for his "lechon manok" (roasted chicken) business

loans.name: Fetu

texts.en: Fetu is a 26-year-old single woman with no children. She makes and sells ice-cakes in her community to earn a living. She has 1 year of experience with this business. Fetu needs a loan to buy foam cups, cool aid, cordials, a large cooler, water filter, a mini chest freezer and chinese candy. She plans to use her profits to pay for her family's weekly expenses. Fetu has been a member of SPBD since 2014.

loans.use: to buy foam cups, cool aid, cordials, a large cooler, water filter, a mini chest freezer and chinese candy

loans.name: Marianita

texts.en:
Marianita is 60 years old and married with six children. She works very hard to provide for them.

She runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 10000 loan through NWTF to buy items to sell such as shampoo and groceries.

Marianita has been in this business for 4 years.

In the future Marianita would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy items to sell such as shampoo and groceries

loans.name: Christine

texts.en:
Christine is a married woman with three children. Christine is 32 years old and has two children who are currently in school. She is a very hardworking entrepreneur. 

Christine has a business selling dry goods in the Philippines. Christine has been in this business for five years. Christine requested a PHP 11,000 loan amount through NWTF to buy more stock of dry goods to sell such as toys, sandals, slippers, shoes, blouses, etc.

In the future, Christine would like to save enough money so that she can afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy more stock of dry goods to sell such as toys, sandals, slippers, shoes, blouses, etc

loans.name: Jingle Mary

texts.en: Jingle Mary has signed up her membership with PMPC and availed the needed capital to start up a sari-sari store business. She is thankful for the capital extended to a small time loaner like her. Jingle Mary is able to turn the tide in her favor and has made good sales these days. She wants to take advantage of the good fortune. Recently, she availed a loan to restock her store with basic commodities such as canned goods, oil and soy sauce. In the future, she hopes to provide a decent home for her family.

loans.use: to restock her store with basic commodities such as canned goods, oil and soy sauce

loans.name: Cresencia

texts.en:
Cresencia is 48 years old, married and has four children, two of whom are in school.

Cresencia is in the agricultural business, farming vegetables in the Philippines. Cresencia requested a PHP 10,000 loan through NWTF to buy seeds, fertilizers and other farm supplies.

Cresencia has been farming vegetables for 8 years now, and has borrowed 7 times in the past from NWTF to sustain her business.

Cresencia would like to build and expand her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to buy seeds, fertilizers and other farm supplies

loans.name: Judith

texts.en:
Judith is a married woman with two children.  Judith is 30 years old and has two children who are in school. She is a very hardworking entrepreneur.

Judith has a fishing business in the Philippines. Judith requested a PHP 20,000 loan amount through NWTF to buy materials needed for the maintenance of her boat.

Judith has been in this business for three years. In the future, Judith would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy materials needed for the maintenance of her boat

loans.name: Erlinda

texts.en:
Erlinda is 40 years old and married with four children. With two children currently in school, Erlinda works very hard to provide for them.

Erlinda runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 10,000 loan through NWTF to purchase more items to sell such as bread, detergent soap, canned goods, shampoo, sanitary pads, etc.

Erlinda has been in this business for five years and sells a variety of items such as bread, detergent soap, canned goods, shampoo, sanitary pads, etc. 

In the future, Erlinda would like to save enough money so that she can afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to purchase more items to sell such as bread, detergent soap, canned goods, shampoo, sanitary pads, etc

loans.name: Sally

texts.en: Sally has been operating a motorcycle transport business and earning well for the family. Her husband personally operates the said business while she sells food in their village to make a living. She earns better income from this activity and had successfully repaid her previous loan used for her businesses. Improving her business is one of her commitments because she wants to ensure a better source of income for her family. To improve sales, she took a new loan recently to buy more raw ingredients to prepare food for sale. She plans to use the profit from her loan to improve the general living conditions of her family.

loans.use: to buy chicken to cook and sell

loans.name: Romeo

texts.en: Romeo is driven by his passion for selling. At the age of 65, a widower in Oroquieta City, he runs a store that primarily supports his family. Everyday he never gets tired of tending his store. Romeo is a fully fledged member of PMPC and has taken several loans already. He religiously repaid his obligations without records of default. Now, he is borrowing again to buy inventories of sugar, milk, oil and noodles to sell. Having enough inventories will mean increased income opportunities. In the future, he dreams of sustaining his store to continuously provide for his family.

loans.use: to buy inventories of sugar, milk, oil and noodles to sell

loans.name: Belinda

texts.en:
Belinda is a married woman with three children. She is a very hard working entrepreneur. Belinda is 36 years old and has three children who are in school.

Belinda has a fish vending business in the Philippines. Belinda requested a PHP 10,000 loan amount through NWTF to purchase additional boxes of fish to sell in her fish stall.

Belinda has been in this business for 5 years. In the future, Belinda would like to save enough money so she can afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to purchase additional boxes of fish to sell in her fish stall

loans.name: Paciencia

texts.en: Paciencia has signed up her membership with PMPC and availed of the needed capital to start up a snack vending business. She is happy for all the support that PMPC has extended to her.   Paciencia is able to turn the tide in her favor and has made good sales. She wants to take advantage of the good fortune. Recently, she availed a loan to purchase ingredients for snack vending. In the future, she hopes to build a descent home for the family.

loans.use: to purchase ingredients for snack vending

loans.name: Elizabeth

texts.en:
Elizabeth is 57 years old and married with three children. Elizabeth works very hard to provide for them.

Elizabeth runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 15000 loan through NWTF to buy additional stocks like biscuits, vinegar, canned goods, noodles, soft-drinks, sugar, coffee and other groceries to sell.

Elizabeth has been in this business for 30 years and sells a variety of items. 

Elizabeth would like to build and expand her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to buy additional stocks like biscuits, vinegar, canned goods, noodles, soft-drinks, sugar, coffee and other groceries to sell

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase more baby's  pampers (diapers), body cream, hair cream, and clothes for resale.

loans.name: Eulalia Julia

texts.es:
Eulalia es una mujer de 40 años de edad, soltera, madre de un hijo y su negocio es la venta de lana de vicuña.
Ella es emprendedora, luchadora, fuerte, visionaria y muy trabajadora, su negocio lo realiza en la zona de ‘Villa Adela’ un lugar caracterizado por el creciente comercio en todas las áreas.
Eulalia es de tez morena, cabello negro largo trenzado, ojos negros, estatura baja, su forma de vestir es tradicional. Su lengua materna es el aymara, utiliza el español para el comercio en la ciudad, su actividad es la venta de lana de vicuña. Ella viaja grandes distancias por el altiplano boliviano para encontrar a productores de lana de vicuña y comprarles la lana, una vez que recolecta la cantidad necesaria, retorna a su taller donde hilvana la lana para convertirla en un hilo delgado y dedicarse al tejido de mantas de vicuña. Sus deseos por expandir su negocio la han llevado a capacitarse en tejido a máquina para poder producir mayores cantidades de mantas. Su sueño es tener un taller de producción de mantas de vicuña, ella necesita comprar una máquina de tejer y dar pie al inicio de sus sueños.
Es por esos motivos que Eulalia solicita un préstamo para la compra de una máquina de tejer y comenzar a cumplir sus sueños.
texts.en:
Eulalia is a 40-year-old woman, single, and the mother of one son. Her business is selling llama wool.

She is enterprising, fighting, strong, visionary, and very hard working. She does her business in the Villa Adela zone, a place characterized by the growing business everywhere.

Eulalia has a brown complexion, long, black, braided hair, black eyes, short stature, and dresses traditionally. Her native language is Aymara. She uses Spanish for business in the city. She sells llama wool. She travels great distances through the high Bolivian plains to find llama wool producers and buy the wool. Once she gets the amount she needs, she goes back to her shop where she puts together the wool to turn it into a thin thread and weave it into llama wool blankets. Her desires to expand her business have brought her to train herself in weaving with a machine to be able to produce larger quantities of blankets. Her dream is to have a llama wool blanket production shop. She needs to buy a weaving machine and put her dreams into motion.

It is for these reasons that Eulalia is requesting a loan to purchase a weaving machine to begin working on her dreams.

loans.use: to purchase a weaving machine and start realizing her dreams.

loans.name: Alaysa

texts.en:
Alaysa is very thankful for the financial assistance extended to her. She has been successful in business for years, and she repaid her previous loan used for her variety store. Aside from this, she also owns and operates a tricycle unit. This helps her to earn additional profit and to provide for their every day needs.

For this business, she would like to take a new loan to buy spare parts and accessories for their vehicle. She is requesting an amount of PHP 19,000 for the maintenance of the tricycle and to pay for the renewal of franchise agreement / permit so she could continue her business operation. She sincerely sends her heartfelt thanks and appreciation for this assistance in advance.

In the future, Alaysa wants to buy another unit of tricycle and she also desires to start up and manage new business opportunities. She also hopes continuous strength and provision for her family especially for her children's education. She meets up with her co-fellowship* members to share stories of her life and business every week and where she can also draw strength and inspiration from the fellowship and the Word of God she studies.

*All CCT community partners / clients are organized into fellowship groups that meet on a weekly basis. A fellowship group is composed of 15 to 30 community partners. The fellowship groups gather each week to study the Word of God, build social capital, and repay Micro Finance loans.

loans.use: to pay for the spare parts and maintenance of her tricycle unit.

loans.name: Valentina

texts.es:
Valentina es una mujer de 39 años de edad, casada, madre de dos hijos y su negocio es una tienda de barrio.
Ella es una persona fuerte, humilde, luchadora, perseverante, conversadora y muy trabajadora, su negocio lo realiza en su domicilio ubicado en el ‘plan 3000’ situado al sur de la ciudad a una distancia de 12 kilómetros del centro, esta zona se caracteriza por las miles de vendedoras organizadas en sus gremiales, Sobre un piso de tierra enlodada por aguas hediondas, encima de taburetes de madera y bajo techos de chapa y lona, se aglomeran puestos de verduras y frutas, pollos y carnes rojas, las infinitas variedades de cereales y papas andinas y un sinfín de alimentos manipulados por mujeres de polleras largas, Se intercalan con puestos de ropa, equipos de audio, DVD, cuadernos y bolígrafos, adornos y jabones, y las músicas nacidas de los más increíbles mestizajes.
Valentina es de tez morena, cabello negro largo trenzado y baja estatura, la atención de su negocio lo realiza de lunes a domingo desde las seis de la mañana hasta las doce de la noche. Ella vende todo tipo de alimentos de primera necesidad para el hogar como ser; pan, huevos, aceite, arroz, refrescos, leche, azúcar, etc. Ella desea ampliar su negocio para mejorar la calidad de vida de su familia. Su necesidad principal es la compra de mercadería para la tienda por mayor y de esa manera abaratar costos y gastos.
Es por esos motivos que Valentina solicita un préstamo para la compra de insumos de primera necesidad para el hogar por mayor y con los beneficios mejorar la calidad de vida de su familia.
texts.en:
Valentina is a 39-year-old woman, married, and the mother of two children. Her business is a neighborhood store.

She is a strong, humble, fighting, persevering, conservative, and very hard working person. She runs her business out of her home, located in the "3000 plan," south of the city. It is 12 kilometers from the center of town. This zone is characterized by the thousands of vendors organized by trade. Over a dirt floor covered with smelly water, on top of wood stools, and below steel and canvas roofs, there is a conglomerate of vendor stalls. There are stalls for vegetables and fruits, chicken and red meats, infinite varieties of cereal, Andean potatoes, and limitless groceries handled by women in long skirts. Interspersed among these are stalls of clothing, audio equipment, DVD, notebooks and pens, jewelry and soaps, and music born from the most incredible hybrids.

Valentina has a dark complexion, long, braided, black hair, and short stature. She works at her business Monday to Sunday, from six in the morning to 12 at night. She sells all types of basic-necessity household items such as bread, eggs, oil, rice, beverages, milk, sugar, etc. She wants to grow her business to improve her family's quality of life. Her main need is to purchase merchandise wholesale for the store, thus cutting costs and expenses.

It is for these reasons that Valentina is requesting a loan to purchase basic-necessity household goods wholesale, and with the savings to improve her family's quality of life.

loans.use: to purchase basic-necessity household items wholesale, and with the savings, to improve her family's quality of life.

loans.name: Jessica Milagros

texts.es:
Jessica tiene 20 años de edad, de estado civil conviviente vive junto con su familia, en su propia casa, en el Caserío Carrasquillo a 15 minutos de Morropon, su población se dedica a la agricultura, comercio y ganadería, ubicada en la Provincia de Morropon, departamento de Piura, costa norte del Perú.

Ella se dedica a la venta de cerveza, preparación y venta de chicha de Jora y clarito actividad que realiza con una antiguaedad de 2 años. Ella ha solicitado un préstamo a Edpyme Alternativa de 3200 nuevos soles para la compra de harina para la preparacion de chicha y ponder atender a más clientes, otra parte del dinero será para cancelar la totalidad de su credito en Edificar, y poder trabajar solo con Edpyme Alternativa y de esta manera tener una producción oportuna para ofrecer a sus clientes y generar mayores ingresos y calidad de vida para su familia.
texts.en:
Jessica is 20 years old, and is in a civil union.  She lives with her family in her own house in  Caserío  Carrasquillo, 15 minutes from Morropon.  The people there earn their living in farming, business and cattle-raising.  Morropon is located in Morropon Province, Piura Department, on the northern coast of Peru.

Jessica earns her living selling beer, preparing and selling chicha de Jora (corn beer) and clarito (specialty beer), work she has been doing for four years.   She is asking for a loan from Edpyme Alternativa of 3200 Peruvian Nuevo Soles to buy flour for preparing chicha and taking care of customers.  Another part of the money will go to pay off her entire loan with Edificar, so that she can work only with Edpyme Alternativa.  In this way she will have a good product to offer her customers and generate a better income and quality of life for her family.

loans.use: to buy flour for making beer, and to pay off a debt to Edificar and work only with one financial institution to fulfill her obligations on time

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase new coverings and tablecloths for her social event business.

loans.name: Ballivian Group

texts.es:
Mary es una mujer joven de 21 años de edad soltera, sin hijos y se dedica a la venta de comida y venta de ropa.
Ella es una mujer emprendedora, luchadora, inteligente, positiva, enérgica, incansable y muy trabajadora, sus negocios los realiza en ‘el tejar’ una zona compuesta por pendientes pronunciadas, que no hacen posible la circulación vehicular, por lo que las calles son mayoritariamente peatonales.
Mary es de tez morena, cabello negro largo, su forma de vestir es moderna y es de baja estatura (morral verde y suéter negro al centro de la foto). Ella tiene metas y objetivos para comenzar a lograrlos formó una banca de personas con emprendimientos diferentes y necesidades similares a la cual denominó ‘Universitario’ con el fin de solicitar un préstamo.
Mary reparte su tiempo en dos actividades; de lunes a viernes se dedica a la venta de ropa en un puesto ubicado en la calle, los fines de semana abandona su puesto de ropa para ponerse su delantal y dedicarse a la venta de comida. Ella desea prosperar en sus negocios para mejorar su calidad de vida, para ello necesita realizar la compra de ropa por mayor y de esa manera abaratar costos y obtener un mayor beneficio.
Es por esos motivos que Mary solicita un préstamo para la compra de ropa por mayor y mejorar su calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Mary is a young 21-year-old single woman with no children.  She sells food and clothing and is a very hardworking, intelligent, positive, energetic, tireless entrepreneur.  She has her businesses in “El Tejar,” an area on a steep slope that makes vehicle traffic impossible, so the streets are mainly for pedestrians.

Mary has a dark complexion, long black hair, dresses in a modern style and is short (wearing a black sweater and green backpack in the photo).  Her goal was to form a group of people with various businesses and similar needs, which she called “University” so they could request a loan.

Mary splits her time between two activities.  She sells clothing from a stall in the street from Monday through Friday and on the weekends she dawns her apron in order to sell food.  She wants to succeed in her businesses in order to improve her quality of life, so she needs to buy clothing in quantity.  In this way she can save on cost and obtain a greater benefit.  Mary is asking for a loan to buy clothing in quantity and improve her quality of life.

loans.use: to buy clothing.

loans.name: Merlynn

texts.en:
As a married parent with two children, Merlynn works hard to support her family.

She has a food vending business in the Philippines, and also earns additional income from raising pigs. Merlynn is borrowing 15,000 PHP through NWTF to buy ingredients for her food production business.

Merlynn has been sustaining her business activities through her past 5 loans from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream of saving enough money to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy ingredients for her food production business

loans.name: Luisa

texts.pt:
Nasceu em Namaacha Província de Maputo tem 51 anos de idade solteira, mãe de 6 filhos dos quais 3 frequentam a escola.
Trabalha na educação a mais de 10 anos como docente, ganha um valor  que aplica nas despesas da sua casa e na obra. Com o empréstimo solicitado pretende dar continuidade a sua obra de residência adquirindo material de construção como areia, cimento, varões e outro que for necessário. Este é o seu 4º empréstimo na hluvuku.
Futuramente pretende concluir a sua casa, mobiliar e mais tarde adquirir uma viatura.
texts.en:
Luisa was born in Namaacha Province in Maputo. She is 51 years old, unmarried, and the mother of six children, three of whom are in school.
She has been working as a teacher for more than ten years. She uses what she earns to pay for household expenses and construction costs. She will use this loan to continue the work on her home, purchasing construction materials such as sand, cement, and anything else that is needed. This is her fourth loan from Hluvuku.
In the future she hopes to finish and furnish her home and then buy a vehicle.

loans.use: to continue the work on her home, purchasing construction materials such as sand, cement, and anything else that is needed.

loans.name: Maria

texts.pt:
Nasceu em Moamba Província de Maputo tem 60 anos de idade é viúva, mãe de 5 filhos maiores de idade, todos frequentam a escola e não responsabiliza-se por mais ninguém.
É doméstica pois recebe a pensão do falecido marido que aplica nas despesas da sua casa e na obra. Com este empréstimo pretende fazer muro de vedação na sua residência adquirindo material de construção como: areia, cimento e blocos. Este é o seu 5º empréstimo na hluvuku.
Futuramente pretende ampliar as suas dependências para aluguer. O seu maior desafio é da deslocação de Namaacha a Boane para aquisição de material de construção por ser acessível.
texts.en:
Maria was born in Moamba Province in Maputo. She is 60 years old and a widow, with five young children who are all school in school. She is not financially responsible for anyone else.
She is a housewife and receives her late husband's pension, which she uses to cover household expenses and construction costs. She will use this loan to build a wall around her house, purchasing construction material such as sand, cement, and cinder blocks. This is her fifth loan from Hluvuku.
In the future she intends to expand the rooms to be rent out. Her biggest challenge is having to travel from Namaacha to Boane to find construction material because it's easier to get there.

loans.use: to build a wall around her house, purchasing construction material such as sand, cement, and cinder blocks.

loans.name: Edson Josimar

texts.es:
Edson es un joven emprendedor, tiene 21 años de edad, es soltero y vive en Santiago junto a su familia.
Su mayor motivación en la vida es su familia, es por ellos que lucha día a día para poder apoyarlos ya que sus padres son de escasos recursos económicos y él quiere brindarles un futuro mejor.
Desde hace algún tiempo trabaja en una Empresa Minera y le va muy bien porque es muy trabajador, responsable y siempre se esfuerza en todo lo que hace.
Edson está agradecido con los prestamistas Kiva porque con el apoyo que le han brindado él podrá mejorar su vivienda como pintarrajear las paredes y reparar las ventanas y las puertas, de esta manera podrá ofrecer a su familia una vivienda más segura y mejorarán su calidad de vida. Gracias a esto él trabajará con mayor tranquilidad y seguirá luchando para poder dar un futuro mejor a su familia, en especial a su madre.
texts.en: Edson is a young entrepreneur.  He is 21 years old, single, and lives with his family in Santiago.  His family is his main motivation for life and he strives for them daily in order to support them, since his parents are of limited financial resources and he wants to provide them with a better future.  He has been working for a mining company for some time, since he his very hardworking, responsible, and always makes a great effort for all he does.  Edson is grateful to the Kiva lenders because he will be able to make improvements to his home, such as painting the walls and repairing the windows and doors.  In this way he will be able to provide his family with a safer home and improve their quality of life.  Thanks to this, he works in a more relaxed manner and he will continue to strive to provide a better future for his family, especially his mother.

loans.use: to make home repairs.

loans.name: Amilcar

texts.pt:
Nasceu em Namaacha Província de Maputo tem 29 anos de idade vive maritalmente é pai de gémeos menores de idade, responsabiliza-se pela sua sobrinha que vive em sua casa.
Trabalha na Educação como docente N4 a mais de 5 anos e é negociante de produtos de beleza, ganha um valor que aplica nas despesas da sua casa. Com o empréstimo solicitado pretende aumentar o volume do seu negócio adquirindo cabelos. Este é o seu 3º empréstimo na hluvuku.
Futuramente pretende abrir uma empresa de consultoria e terminar com os seus estudos até ao nível superior. O seu maior desafio é manter o seu negócio para conseguir amortizar a sua divida.
texts.en:
Amilcar was born in Namaacha Provnice in Maputo. He is 29 years old and lives with his partner. They have young twins. He is also responsible for his niece, who lives with him.
He has worked in education as a teacher for more than 5 years, and he also has a business selling beauty products. He uses his earnings to cover household expenses. He will use this loan to increase the volume of stock he carries, purchasing additional hair. This is his third loan from Hluvuku.
In the future he plans to open a consulting business and finish his studies by pursuing a higher education. His biggest goal is to keep his business going so he can pay off his loan.

loans.use: to increase the volume of stock he carries, purchasing additional hair.

loans.name: Pires

texts.pt:
Nasceu em Namaacha Província de Maputo tem 25 anos de idade, vive maritalmente pai de 2 filhos menores de idade, responsabiliza-se pela sua sobrinha que vive na casa da sua mãe.
Trabalha na Empresa Água de Namaacha a mais de 6 anos como Mecânico aufere um valor que aplica nas despesas da casa e na obra. Com este empréstimo pretende iniciar com a sua obra de residência adquirindo material de construção como área, cimento, varões e pedra. Este é o seu 3º empréstimo na hluvuku.
Futuramente pretende concluir a sua casa para dar mais conforto a sua família e garantir o ensino dos filhos.
texts.en:
Pires was born in Namaacha Province in Maputo. He is 25 years old and lives with his partner. They have two young children. He also takes care of his neice, who lives with her mother.
He has worked as a mechanic at the Namaacha water company for more than 6 years, and he uses his salary to cover household expenses and construction costs. He will use this loan to start building a house, purchasing construction materials such as sand, cement, and stone. This is his third loan from Hluvuku.
In the future he hopes to finish building his home so he can offer his family a more comfortable life and send his two children to school.

loans.use: to start building a house, purchasing construction materials such as sand, cement, and stone.

loans.name: Laura

texts.pt:
Nasceu em Namaacha Província de Maputo tem 36 anos de idade vive maritalmente mãe de 1 filha maior de idade que frequenta a escola, responsabiliza-se pela sua sobrinha que vive em sua casa.
Trabalha na Educação a mais de 6 anos como Assistente Técnica e é proprietária de um estabelecimento comercial, ganha um valor que aplica nas despesas da sua casa e na obra. Com o empréstimo solicitado pretende dar continuidade a sua obra de residência adquirindo material de construção como areia, cimento e pedra. Este é o seu 3º empréstimo na hluvuku.
Futuramente pretende adquirir uma viatura e garantir o ensino da sua filha até ao nível superior. O seu maior desafio é erguer dependências para aluguer.
texts.en:
Laura was born in Namaacha Province in Maputo. She is 36 years old and lives with her partner. They have one adult daughter who is in school, and Laura also takes care of her niece, who lives with them.
She has been working in education as a technical assistant for more than six years, and she also owns her own shop. She uses her earnings to pay for household expenses and construction costs. She will use this loan to continue the work on her home, purchasing construction materials such as sand, cement, and stone. This is her third loan from Hluvuku.
In the future she hopes to acquire a car and be able to pay for her daughter to pursue higher education. Her biggest goal is to build rooms to rent out.

loans.use: to continue the work on her home, purchasing construction materials such as sand, cement, and stone.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy compost and pay for irrigation.

loans.name: Sabino

texts.es:
Sabino es un dedicado padre de 27 años de edad. Tiene un pequeño hijo de 3 años de edad. Vive en Ica junto a su familia. Por algunos problemas que tuvo con su pareja no vive con ella pero eso no es un impedimento para que se haga cargo de su hijo quien es su mayor motivación en la vida para salir adelante.
Actualmente trabaja en una prestigiosa empresa como Obrero y le va muy bien ya que sus padres desde pequeño le inculcaron muchos valores, también es estudiante de la Carrera de Administración de Empresas, es un joven brillante.
Sabino tiene previsto utilizar el crédito para comprar un artefacto, una refrigeradora, para que pueda guardar sus comidas y sean más duraderos. Él está muy agradecido con los prestamistas Kiva por su generosidad y quiere que ellos sepan que su ayuda le permitirá mejorar su calidad de vida y con esto seguirá esforzándose para más adelante convertirse en un profesional exitoso y pueda sacar adelante a su familia.
texts.en:
Sabino is 27 and a dedicated father.  He has a young three-year-old son and lives in Ica with his family.  He doesn’t live with his wife because of some problems he had with her, but this has not prevented him from caring for his son, who is his main motivation for living and getting ahead.

He currently works as a laborer for a prestigious company and things are going very well for him because his parents provided him with good values when he was a boy.  He is also a student of business management and is a bright young man.

Sabino wants to use the money from this loan to buy a refrigerator where he can store his food so that it will last longer.  He is very grateful to the Kiva lenders for their generosity and he wants them to know that their help will allow him to improve his quality of life and that he will continue to strive to get ahead and become a successful professional so he can get his family ahead.

loans.use: to buy a refrigerator.

loans.name: Nidia Lucia

texts.es: Doña Nidia, quiere invertir en su negocio nuevamente, ya que es su prioridad mantenerlo siempre surtido para dar la mejor atención a sus clientes, con el crédito solicitado comprará productos como perfumes, colonias, cosméticos y cremas, productos de alta demanda al ser utilizados diariamente por sus clientes. Con el crédito anterior le fue muy bien, pudo comprar lo que tenia planeado, y así no dejar de percibir el ingreso necesario para la manutención de su familia. Tiene 23 años de tener el negocio, sus planes inmediatos después de pagar este crédito es comprar una paca de ropa usada, para también vender.
texts.en:
Doña Nidia wants to invest in her business again. Her priority has always been to keep her business stocked so that she can provide better service to her customers. The loan she is requesting will be used to buy products such as perfumes, colognes, cosmetics, and crèmes. These products are in high demand since they are used every day by her customers.

Her previous loan did very well since she was able to buy what she had planned. As a result, she was able to earn the necessary income to sustain her family. Nidia has been in business for 23 years. After repaying this loan, her immediate plans include buying a bundle of used clothing that she can sell.

loans.use: to buy beauty products for men and women.

loans.name: Luz Veronica

texts.es: Luz es una joven emprendedora, tiene 26 años de edad, es soltera y vive en Ica junto a su familia. Tiene un pequeño hijo quien es su mayor motivación en la vida y por quien lucha día a día para poder brindarle un futuro mejor. Ella trabaja como Obrera de Campo en un Fundo agrícola y siempre se esfuerza por hacer un trabajo de calidad. Con este préstamos Luz tiene pensado remodelar su vivienda como pintarrajear las paredes y cambiar las paredes y puertas ya que están un poco deterioradas. Así brindará mayor seguridad a su familia y seguirá laborando de manera más tranquila. Con esto ella más adelante espera cumplir uno de sus más grandes sueños: "Tener su propia vivienda".
texts.en:
Luz is a young, 26 year old, entrepreneur.  She is single and lives in Ica with her family.  She has a young son who is her main motivation for living and for whom she strives daily to provide him a better future.

She works as a field laborer for a farm and always strives to do quality work.  She wants to use the money from this loan to paint her walls and replace those walls and windows that are deteriorated.  This way she will be able to provide her family with better security and she can work in a more relaxed manner.  With this, she hopes to achieve one of her greatest dreams in the future, “To have her own home.”

loans.use: to make home improvements.

loans.name: Jimmy Enrique

texts.es:
Jimmi tiene 29 años de edad, vive con su conyugue e hijo en su propia casa del Caserío Franco alto, una comunidad que se dedica a la agricultura, comercio y ganadería, ubicada en el distrito de Morropon, que pertenece al departamento de Piura, costa norte del Perú.

Él se dedica a la crianza y venta de animales caprinos con una antigüedad de 7 años. Su negocio se encuentra ubicado en la parte posterior de su domicilio, ha solicitado un préstamo a Edpyme Alternativa de 1000 nuevos soles para la compra de un lote de caprinos que se le ha sido ofrecido, la otra parte sera para la construcción y mejoramiento del corral de animales, esto le permitirá criar sus animales de una mejor forma y de esta manera podrá ofrecerlo a un mejor precio, generando así mayores ingresos y con ello mejorará tambien su calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Jimmy is 29 years old. He lives with his wife and son in his own home in Caserio Franco Alto, a community that dedicates itself to farming, business, and ranching. It is located in the Morropon district, which is in the department of Piura, on the northern coast of Peru.

He has been raising and selling goats for seven years.

His business is located in the back part of his home. He has requested a loan from Kiva partner Edpyme Alternativa for 1,000 nuevos soles to purchase a herd of goats that he has been offered. The other part of the loan will be for constructing and improving his animal corral. This will allow him to raise his animals in a better way, thus being able to sell them at a better price and generate better revenues. With this, he will also improve his quality of life.

loans.use: to invest in his business. This is to purchase a herd of goats and build corrals for his livestock.

loans.name: Marilyn

texts.en:
Marilyn is 43 years old and has one child. She is married and has one child who is in school.

Marilyn is in the agricultural business, pig fattening in the Philippines. She requested a PHP 10,000 loan through NWTF to buy feed and vitamins for her pigs.

Marilyn has been pig fattening for 11 years now, and has borrowed two times in the past from NWTF to sustain it.

Marilyn would like to build and expand her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to buy feed and vitamins for her pigs

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy fish.

loans.name: Mary Joy

texts.en: Mary Joy has the skills to grow a variety of plants. She busies herself with her hobby at the same time earning an income. She always dreamed of improving her garden to earn a living to support her two children. Mary Joy presented her project proposal to PMPC for her needed capital. She is seeking an amount to buy compost, pots and ornamental plants. She hopes to expand her gardening activities to earn more.

loans.use: to buy compost, pots and ornamental plants

loans.name: Floresmila

texts.es:
Floresmila tiene 36 años de edad, vive con su esposo e hijos en casa familiar, en una comunidad pequeña del Caserio Ternique. Ella goza con buenas referencias personales y laborales de parte de sus vecinos, su población se dedica a la agricultura, comercio y ganadería, su caserio se ubica en el distrito de la Matanza, provincia de Morropon, departamento de Piura, costa norte del Perú.

La actividad que realiza Floresmila es la crianza y venta de animales, como patos, gallinas y pollos, desde hace 3 años en su propio domicilio, ha solicitado un préstamo a Edpyme Alternativa de 1000 nuevos soles para la compra de alimentos para engorde de los mismo, lo cual le permitirá ofrecerlos a un mejor precio a otros comerciantes mayores. Floresmila ya ha trabajado con nosotros y a demostrado un buen récord de pagos.
texts.en:
Floresmila is 36 years old. She lives with her husband and children in the family home in a small community in Caserio Ternique. She has good personal and professional references from her neighbors. The population works in agriculture, business, and ranching. The Caserio is located in the district of Matanza, province of Morropon, department of Piura, on the northern coast of Peru.

Floresmila has been raising and selling animals, such as ducks, hens, and chickens, from her own home. She has requested a loan from Kiva partner Edpyme Alternativa for 1,000 nuevos soles to purchase food to fatten up the animals. This will allow her to sell them at a better price to other larger vendors. Floresmila has already worked with us and has demonstrated a good payment record.

loans.use: to purchase food for her livestock.

loans.name: Juan Antonio

texts.es:
Juan vive con su pareja y dos hijos en una zona rural cerca del municipio de Monteria.

Lleva 15 años trabajando duro en la producción agropecuaria.  Desde muy joven lleva trabajando todos los días. Gracias a sus padres, el aprendió sobre la cultivación.

El crédito lo usara para poder comprar insumos agropecuarios como semillas, abonos y fertilizantes para preparar su tierra. Estos insumos le ayudaran a mejorar su cultivo.

Sin el crédito seria mas difícil cultivar mayor cantidad y calidad de cultivo.

Juan sueña con legalizar su parcela para poder tener la seguridad de ser dueño de una propiedad.

¡Apoye a Juan hoy e impacte su futuro con un crédito Kiva!
texts.en:
Juan lives with his wife and two children in a rural area near Monteria.

He has been working hard in agriculture for the past 15 years and has worked every day since he was a young man.  Thanks to his parents, he was able to learn about farming.

He will use the money from this loan to buy agricultural supplies such as seeds, fertilizers, and compost in order to prepare the land.  These supplies will help him improve his crops.

Without the loan, it will be more difficult for him to farm in terms of quality and quantity of crops.

Juan dreams of owning his parcel of land so he can have the security of being a landowner.

Support Juan today and impact his future with a Kiva loan!

loans.use: to buy farming supplies.

loans.name: Nellys Yanet

texts.es:
Nelly es una experimentada mujer de una considerable edad, que ha vivido en son e sus 5 hijos los cuales crio y alimento sola ejerciendo el papel de madre y madre con la ayuda de una pequeña tienda. 

Quiere solicitar un crédito para surtir su negocio pues en el momento pasa por una crisis donde las ventas están disminuyendo lo que le afecta su capital y pone en riesgo la alimentación de sus hijos. 

Con el crédito comprara surtido de la canasta familiar, frijoles, alverjas, arroz, panela etc. 

Sueña con seguir su estilo de vida pues moralmente está muy deprimida pro la situación que está atravesando
texts.en:
Nelly is an experienced woman of considerable age, and has five children whom she raised and fed on her own, playing the role of mother and mother with the help of a small store.

She wants to request a loan so she can stock her business because she is currently experiencing a crisis where her sales are decreasing which affects her capital and places her ability to feed her children at risk.

She will use the money from this loan to buy food items, beans, peas, rice, pots, etc.
